text: Bernard Cribbins, OBE (29 December 1928 â€“ 27 July 2022) was an English actor, voice-over artist and musical comedian. His career spanned over seventy years. Cribbins was known for his role as Wilfred Mott in Doctor Who. He was also known for being the narrator of The Wombles. Cribbins died on 27 July 2022, aged 93. ==References== ==Other websites== * * *Bernard Cribbins at The Actors Compendium Category:1928 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Actors from Lancashire Category:Comedians from Lancashire Category:English movie actors Category:English singers Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors Category:People from Oldham
